page.title: 17Changing times, Fraserburgh
page.content:
The schools have changed since 1965 because you didn't have to wear a uniform at the Academy.There are a lot more houses and shops. Hair, clothes, shoes etc. have all changed. The harbour has been deepened and they are going to take in supply boats to fuel them. Everything has gone up in price but there is a lot more pay.
There are many videos and computers. There is a lot of under aged drinking and you can't get a proper night out without under aged drinkers fighting. The Broadgate (Broad Street) has got an island for crossing the road, phone boxes and a new bus shelter. All the buses used to be double deckers. There is a new shop and tea room at the beach. Many houses are more modern. Many young boys are running around in new cars. .
